name: Leeroy's House of Floor Murals
description:
Fullscreen and Sound Recommended. Arrow keys to control.

Journey into the depths of the mansion with burning questions about Leeroy's legacy. See through the deception and claim your prize if you dare!

Made in 8hrs (plus some polish) for the Leeroy Horror Jam. Leeroy is a dog that everybody likes so a bunch of people painted him. #backstory
